findings.title: Exec Allowlist Could Be More Restrictive
findings.description: Exec tool uses allowlist policy (good!) but includes 'find' command which has potential for misuse with complex arguments.
findings.impact: Minimal. Configuration already follows security best practices. Minor optimization opportunity.
findings.remediation: Consider removing 'find' from allowlist if not actively used. Alternative: restrict find to specific paths only.

security_highlights: ✅ Strong gateway token (64 characters, high entropy)
✅ Browser security: JavaScript disabled, downloads disabled
✅ Prompt guard enabled with high threshold
verdict: EXCELLENT security posture. Configuration follows best practices. Minor optimization possible but not critical.
